scripts.deploy-develop: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployMocks config.develop.json && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.develop.json
scripts.deploy-develop-first-time: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployMocks config.develop.json && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.develop.json --first-time
scripts.deploy-kovan: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.kovan.json
scripts.deploy-kovan-first-time: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.kovan.json --first-time
scripts.deploy-kovan-infura: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.kovan.infura.json
scripts.deploy-kovan-infura-first-time: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.kovan.infura.json --first-time
scripts.deploy-live: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.live.json
scripts.deploy-live-first-time: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.live.json --first-time
scripts.deploy-live-infura: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.live.infura.json
scripts.deploy-live-infura-first-time: npm run prepare && babel-node bin/deployContracts config.live.infura.json --first-time
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run publish-abi && npm run lint && npm run test
